children.text:
Help/Info:

1 Radio News plays news radio on-demand in English.  It also plays live news, talk, and other spoken-word audio streams.

Welcome to the club. 1 Radio News listeners are among the most informed and globally connected radio news lovers in the world.

Be surprised. Have fun. Explore the world.

Table of Contents

	1.	Key Tips
	2.	Headlines and Shows On-Demand
	3.	Live News, Talk, and More
	4.	Technical Issues
	5.	Future Features, Rate App
	6.	Disclaimer

-- 1. Key Tips --

* Swipe for more stations/shows.
* Use your device to adjust volume.
* Press “Play All” to listen to headlines in order displayed.
* Be patient with live streams. Faster connections work better.
* Use other apps while listening. Re-open app to pause audio or exit app completely.
* Some streams will be temporarily down. This is NOT under the control of 1 Radio News.
* Most stations are in English. Many global “shortwave” stations change languages, visit 1radionews.com/schedules to determine times to listen for select stations.
* Free does NOT have our favorites PlayMix feature or a sleep timer. Upgrade to Pro: 1radionews.com
* Get our e-newsletter/blog and connect with the community from: 1radionews.com


-- 2. Headlines and Shows On-Demand--

Headlines and shows are in English. On-demand shows use “podcast” feeds to simply play the most recent episode. Loading time varies.

Our focus is on the most popular, freshest, and frequently updated news and culture shows.

Free shows are roughly organized:
* top hourly news
* short daily news headlines
* limited time special collection

If you *upgrade* our Pro on-demand collection continues with:
* top daily global news magazines
* global “shortwave” daily and some weekly shows/podcasts
* more daily news shows from major English-speaking countries
* daily business news
* daily technology news
* highest rated weekly entertainment from public broadcasters (mostly)
* world’s top ~weekly podcasts not from radio
* learning English shows and podcasts
* weekly science, environment, and technology showcase
* kids showcase

-- 3. Live News, Talk, and More --

Carefully selected live radio stations are mostly in English with some exceptions.

We focus primarily on public radio, international broadcasters, and unique English-language radio sources.

On PRO, our bonus global multilingual “shortwave” section has stations with some English, see the links from 1radionews.com/schedules for directories across the web. Stations with music that we select tend to have local news in *their* local morning.


-- 4. Technical Issues --

Live streams are only as reliable as your Internet connection, your mobile data speed, and/or the streaming service provided by the station.

Depending upon your mobile plan, streaming audio may incur data costs with your mobile provider. Use on Wi-Fi to avoid mobile data costs.

While we select the lowest bandwidth live streams available, most will NOT work with 3G or less. On-demand, if you are patient, will load and play on any connection.

Stations change periodically.

Report streams that do not work over TWO days or more to: comments@1radionews.com

This app automatically checks for our station updates weekly when you use it.

-- 6. Future Features, Rate App --

Future features are added based on app popularity. So please rate on Google Play and share 1 Radio News today: 1radionews.com/share

Clicking on the ads that interest you supports new features. Contact us to join our beta testing online community: comments@1radionews.com

-- 7. Disclaimer --

There is no connection, endorsement, etc. between radio broadcasters and 1 Radio News. All rights are reserved by each broadcaster and they are responsible for their own content.

1 Radio News carefully curates a selection of free radio services to provide you with the easiest way to listen and "change the channel" quickly. Many of these audio services are difficult to find on the web, but are free somewhere.

Do not make new selections on 1 Radio News while driving a moving vehicle. Press play safely.

See the 1RadioNews.com website for more information.
